SELECT DISTINCT a.accountId FROM (SELECT accountId FROM mbr_audit_account UNION ALL SELECT accountId FROM mbr_audit_bonus) a INNER JOIN mbr_account t ON a.accountid = t.id INNER JOIN ( SELECT * from rpt_bet_rcd_day WHERE startday >= now()-interval 2 day ) b ON b.username = t.loginname
AND a.accountId =#{accountId}
SELECT count(*) FROM mbr_audit_account WHERE depositAudit > 1 AND `status` = 0 AND accountId =#{accountId}

SELECT count(*) FROM mbr_audit_account acount LEFT JOIN opr_act_rule rule ON acount.ruleId = rule.id LEFT JOIN t_op_acttmpl al ON rule.actTmplId = al.id WHERE acount.accountId=#{accountId} AND al.tmplCode =#{tmplCode} AND acount.status =0

select count(*) from mbr_audit_account where ruleid is not null and status = 0 and accountId=#{accountId} and ruleid not in ( -- 反水优惠 select rule.id from opr_act_rule rule LEFT JOIN t_op_acttmpl al ON rule.actTmplId = al.id where al.tmplCode='AQ0000005' )

SELECT acount.* FROM mbr_audit_account acount LEFT JOIN opr_act_rule rule ON acount.ruleId = rule.id LEFT JOIN t_op_acttmpl al ON rule.actTmplId = al.id WHERE acount.accountId=#{accountId} AND al.tmplCode =#{tmplCode} order by acount.time desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM mbr_audit_account WHERE accountId = #{accountId} and id >= (SELECT id FROM mbr_audit_account WHERE accountId = #{accountId} and `status` =0 ORDER BY id LIMIT 1)
